strings.evolution:
It is wise to invest in me.
As long as the pay is good,
I will remain your loyal pet.
strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Gaffgarion is a man who will use any means necessary to ensure victory whenever money is at stake. Originally hired by Dycedarg Beoulve to discard Princess Ovelia, he attempts to persuade Ramza into completing the task in the name of the Beoulve family regardless of Ramza's numerous objections. Whether Gaffgarion's words originated from a genuine concern for his country, or just to carry out his mission, remains unknown.
strings.fusion:
Better not slack when it comes to being prepared.
You can't use enough discretion
if you want to survive on the battlefield.
strings.summon:
You've got quite the eye to pick me, kid.
Sure, I'll do whatever you say.
As long as I'm getting paid for it!

strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. As tensions ran high due to the outbreak of war, Gaffgarion was hired by the Order of the Northern Sky to protect Princess Ovelia en route to Eagrose. He had in fact been division commander of the Order of the Eastern Sky during the Fifty Years' War, but was expelled for the barbarism he employed to ensure his final victory. Now he serves as a superior to his comrade Ramza, who has renounced the name of his noble house.
strings.fusion: Men do not act of their own accord without expecting recompense! You know this to be true.
strings.summon:
You seek my services?
I do expect you have the means to pay my fee.

strings.evolution:
This is useful indeed!
Now earning my fee will be child's play!
strings.affinity: I never act when there is no coin in it for myself, but consider this charity! I shall accompany you a tad longer.
strings.description: A mercenary who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Gaffgarion was a man who would use any means necessary to ensure victory, if money was at stake. Although he had been hired to protect Princess Ovelia, his true mission was revealed to be the elimination of the young girl. However, his plans to assassinate the princess failed thanks to Delita, and he was thus promptly forced to part from Ramza's company.
strings.fusion: The most powerful force in this world is money. Justice and ideals are just pretty words in the wind!
strings.summon: I shall accomplish any mission I undertake, regardless of what it entails. But of course...for the right price.
